headline: 5 Biotech Stocks Worth Adding to Your Portfolio in 2025
summary: New drug approvals and pipeline progress are likely to help maintain the momentum for the Zacks Biomedical and Genetics industry despite the uncertain macro environment. A strong portfolio and solid pipeline progress position INCY, BMRN, EXEL, HALO and BPMC well in this volatile sector.

A strong portfolio and solid pipeline progress position INCY, BMRN, EXEL, HALO and BPMC well in this volatile sector.
